# Predicting amount of exercising based on GPA

## Background

## Data set
```{r}
library(Lock5Data)
data(GPAGender)
```

##Analysis

**function fit**
```{r}
set.seed(563453)

gpa_model_sim <- stan_glm(Exercise ~ SAT + GPA + Pulse + GenderCode, data = GPAGender, family=  gaussian, chains = 4, iter = 10000*2)
``` 

**diagnosis**
```{R}
mcmc_trace(gpa_model_sim, size = 0.1)

```
```{r}
mcmc_dens_overlay(gpa_model_sim)

```

```{r}
gpa_model_sim <- summary(gpa_model_sim)

```
